body: What happened to it. I realize a lot of members left but was it disbanded?
body_tagged: What happened to it. I realize a lot of members left but was it disbanded?
title: Sistahood.

replies.body: I was there when it fell apart. Yoav left. (R.I.P) Jozzy, his like a owner and koo have their own server.
replies.body_tagged: I was there when it fell apart. Yoav left. (R.I.P) Jozzy, his like a owner and koo have their own server.

replies.body: Howsie left, then Yoav, there was pretty much nothing of it left after that.
replies.body_tagged: Howsie left, then Yoav, there was pretty much nothing of it left after that.

replies.body: Yoav was the one who really made it, so when he left it was kind of a no-show.
replies.body_tagged: Yoav was the one who really made it, so when he left it was kind of a no-show.
